original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2021)@</color><color=#FFE787>技能射程：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_range(2021)@</color>從地面召喚5叢橫列的冰柱叢，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2021)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對敵人造成法術傷害。召喚出的冰柱叢會留在戰場上5秒，阻礙敵方移動。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2021)@</color><color=#FFE787>Skill range: </color><color=#ccffcc> $Skill_range(2021)@</color> summon 5 rows of icicle clusters from the ground to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2021)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> Inflict spell damage on the enemy. The summoned icicle clusters will stay on the battlefield for 5 seconds, blocking the movement of the enemy.
